data.name: 执剑九霄
data.detailed_description:
The game is made with RPGmaker MV software and uses the drill + MOG plug-in (thanks to the maker of the plug-in). It is a turn based role-playing game in the style of Chinese immortal Xia. The first one is the [Zhongxuan chapter] of "holding the sword in the sky", which mainly tells about Li mu, a junior brother of the Tianjian sect in Zhongxuan Prefecture who has just started. He was ordered by his teacher to experience in the world of mortals and heard it in Zhongxuan Prefecture, Seeing all kinds of strange people and strange things, he also unknowingly became the witness of an amazing conspiracy. Zhongxuan chapter will be the beginning of the whole story, which may be a little boring. However, as a game development enthusiast, he doesn't understand the program, but in terms of enthusiasm, please believe that jiuxiao with sword will gradually develop and open with the version, Present a better side to gamers.

Players can experience three classes (fairy sword, crazy sword and magic sword) in the game. Each class has its own characteristics. At the same time, it is also equipped with different growth routes, storylines and game experience.

data.short_description: The RPG game produced and developed by RPGmaker MV can complete all operations with the mouse. Overhead in the immortal Xia world of "jiuxiao continent", players can choose any of the three professions. Each profession has a different development route and integrates some open contents.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows/7/8/10简体中文版
  • Processor: P4-1.6G
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 支持DX9.0C64M显存独立显卡
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 支持Direct Sound声卡
